posts.post_content:
T206's FS:  Most just graded by SGC, some have their new half-grades.  All prices are delivered, PayPal (Payment Owed), check or MO.  First PM, Post or Email.  Thank you!


  * Jimmy Collins, P350 - authentic, clearly altered (looks bleached, name missing on bottom - odd) - **SOLD**

  * J Tannehill, P350, SGC40 - $42
  * J Tannehill, P350, SGC45 - $48 **Sold**
  * C Griffith (Port), P150, SGC35 - **SOLD**
  * D Miller, SC350, SGC40 - $42 **SOLD**
  * J Devore, SOV460, SGC20 - $50 **SOLD**
  * M Doolan (batting), P350, SGC40 - $40 **Sold**

  * J Slagle, P350, SGC40 - $40
  * R Ford, SOV460, SGC10 - $45 **SOLD**

  * B Bergan (catching), P350-460, SGC45 - $50

  * C Seymour (batting), P350, SGC50 - $70
  * J Knight (w/bat), SC350, SGC50 - $65 **SOLD**

first time i've seen the new SGC half-grades. funny to see "35, 45, etc" on their flips. :)

nice cards, good luck with your sale!

Hi Ed, I'll take the Griffith. Email sent, thanks.

Mike
